duties_responsibilities.duty: Support and assist Quality Assurance, Production Engineers, and Engineering Management with the management of product documentation in accordance with government/company regulations.
Interface with Production, Project Engineers, Project Engineering Managers, Procurement, Quality, and Customers to implement document management plans.
Collaborate with other divisions on best practices, lessons learned, and training opportunities.
Communicate the Division / Department needs for document management opportunities to management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, information management, information technology, data management, or computer information systems is preferred, though not required.
